thread.title: Tom K
thread.title_full: White Mountain Puzzles reviewed by Tom K

author: Tom K
title: Tom K
text: I love White Mountain's puzzles but was a little disappointed in my recent purchase. 28 pieces of one of the puzzles had delaminated; made for an uneven surface. I've glued and framed numerous puzzles of theirs but would have had difficulty with this one had I chosen to do so.
